{{Wireless embedded system |brand=UDP Technology |model=IPN100HD |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/10/2012 |manuf_country=Korea |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=camera |fcc_id=PIL-IPN100HD,YZP-TWFMKB304D |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U2G8F2CTR-BC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=microSD |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=LG Innotek TWFMKB304D |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43234 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201EL |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.udptechnology.com/products/IP/IPN100HD.html Product page] ([http://www.udptechnology.com Manufacturer's website]) :H.264 Full Frame at HD 720p
"RNTW-MN05A Rev 0.7", "2012.07.13", and "M1X3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report lists additional submodels of.. *IPN100HD-5110 *IPN100HD-5110PIR
The device is using an '''LG Innotek''' TWFMKB304D wireless module (FCC ID: YZP-TWFMKB304D, KCC ID: KCC-CRM-LGW-TWFMKB304D). :The MAC label affixed to the device in the photos has a 94:44:44 ('''LG Innotek''') OUI.
This device is dual stream and based on the DaVinci chipset from TI. All cameras newer than 2 years from '''UDP Technology''' are based on the same CPU module and run the same firmware. :This device also includes advanced [[wikipedia:Video content analysis|video content analysis]] with object based detection. With an additional license, it can do line and area based counting, classification, and speed filtering.
